item.title: Error i got while compiling
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[code]if (playerLevel[14] > 15); {
}
if (actionTimer == 0) {
setAnimation(625);
addItem(440, 1);
sendMessage(“You mine some ore.”);
addSkillXP(215, 14);
actionTimer = 7;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else if {
if (playerLevel[14] < 15); {
sendMessage(“You need 15 mining to mine iron ore.”);
}
}

     break;[/code]

item.title: Error i got while compiling
item.dc:creator: @aplwanabes aplwanabes
item.description:
@aplwanabes wrote:

i get errors

client.java:1541: illegal start of expression
if (playerLevel[14] > 15) && actionTimer == 0)) {
^
client.java:1541: not a statement
if (playerLevel[14] > 15) && actionTimer == 0)) {
^
client.java:1541: ‘;’ expected
if (playerLevel[14] > 15) && actionTimer == 0)) {
^
client.java:1549: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else {
^
4 errors
You have sucsessfully compiled
Press any key to continue . . .
